## IConsoleTerminalProviderOptions interface

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Options to be provided to a [ConsoleTerminalProvider](./terminal.consoleterminalprovider.md)

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IConsoleTerminalProviderOptions 
```

</th><th>

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[debugEnabled](./terminal.iconsoleterminalprovideroptions.debugenabled.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** If true, print debug logging messages. Note that "verbose" and "debug" are considered separate message filters; if you want debug to imply verbose, it is up to your application code to enforce that.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[verboseEnabled](./terminal.iconsoleterminalprovideroptions.verboseenabled.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** If true, print verbose logging messages.


</td></tr>
